Helper: Tidy simulation summaries for plotting

Source: R/make_Kusko_figure_C.R
dot-make_tidy_summary.Rd

Converts list-of-lists summary output from .summarize_by_year() into a single tidy data frame for escapement and harvest, with ribbons and means.

Usage

.make_tidy_summary(summary_list, scen_df, scen_names, summary_stats)

Arguments

summary_list

Output from .summarize_by_year().

scen_df

Full scenario metadata.

scen_names

Vector of scenario labels.

summary_stats

Named vector mapping new names to original stats (e.g., mean = "Mean").

Value

Tidy data.frame with scen, year, mean, ymin, ymax, label, and scenario metadata.

On this page
